Calculate Rmean

Source: R/spectral_calculations.R
calculate_rmean.Rd

calculate mean reflectance from all layers for given pixel.

Usage

calculate_rmean(raster, extent = NULL, ext = NULL, filename = NULL)

Arguments

raster

a terra SpatRaster of normalized capture data.

extent

an extent or SpatVector used to subset SpatRaster. Defaults to the entire SpatRaster.

ext

character, a graphic format extension.

filename

NULL (default) to write automatically into products, provide full path and ext to override.

Value

one layer terra SpatRaster with calculated Rmean values.

See also

Other Spectral calculations: calculate_band_difference(), calculate_band_ratio(), calculate_derivative(), calculate_lambdaremp(), calculate_raba(), calculate_rabd()
